name: Prima Materiactor
text: (This cards name is always treated as "Blue-Eyes White Dragon")/nWhen this card is Pendulum Summoned you may target 1 monster your opponent controls and destroy it.
pendulum_text: Xyz Monsters you control gain 100 ATK for each Xyz Material on the field. You can target 1 "Materiactor" Xyz Monster you control; attach this card to it as material, then draw 1 card. You can only use this effect of "Prima Materiactor" once per turn.
